== Main Inclusion Report for denemo ==

# ''Availability:'' The package is available in ubuntu universe and builds on our three major platforms
# ''Rationale:'' The package is required for the Edubuntu desktop
# ''Security:'' No CVEs or other security issues
# ''Quality assurance:''  
** Needs no setup after install
** No major bugs (4 normal) in <nowiki>[[http://bugs.debian.org/denemo|Debbugs]]</nowiki>
** <nowiki>[[http://denemo.sourceforge.net/mantis/view_all_bug_page.php|Upstream]]</nowiki> has six open bugreports marked major, 
*** 3 about CVS access (their bugtracker has no products, they track everything in one place)
*** 2 usability bugs 
*** 1 build failure
  neither of these seems to affect us or the main inclusion...
# ''Standards compliance:'' The package meets the FHS and Debian Policy.
# ''Dependencies:''
** all in main already, only Recommends: and Suggests: are universe packages
